name: image-filter-applicator
title: Image Filter Applicator
description: Apply preset filters like sepia, vintage, blur, and more to images
content:
Overview

This application applies artistic and creative filters to images. Built using Pillow, it offers six preset filters to enhance or transform your images.

Available Filters

  • Sepia: Classic warm brown tone effect
  • Vintage: Aged photo look with reduced contrast and vignette
  • Grayscale: Black and white conversion
  • Blur: Gaussian blur for soft focus
  • Sharpen: Enhance image sharpness and details
  • Edge Enhance: Emphasize edges and contours

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image from stash
  • Filter: Choose the filter to apply
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a filtered image with the filter name appended, e.g., photo_sepia.jpg.

Use Cases

  • Creating vintage or retro photo effects
  • Enhancing photos for social media
  • Artistic image processing
  • Photo editing and enhancement
  • Creating consistent visual styles
